faq.question: What happens if it rains on the day of my outdoor event?
faq.answer: We can cook under covered patios, gazebos, or move indoors if you have adequate ventilation. Contact us 24 hours before if you need to discuss weather contingency plans.

faq.question: Can guests choose their own proteins?
faq.answer: Yes! Guests can mix and match proteins from your selected package. Just let the chef know individual preferences before cooking begins.

faq.question: Do you provide alcohol?
faq.answer: We don't provide alcohol, but our Premium package includes cocktail setup assistance. You provide the drinks, we'll help with presentation!

faq.question: How far in advance should I book?
faq.answer: We recommend booking 2-4 weeks in advance, especially for weekends. Last-minute bookings may be possible based on availability.

faq.question: What if I need to add more guests after booking?
faq.answer: You can modify your guest count up to 3 days before your event through our Check Booking page. Additional charges apply for extra guests.

faq.question: Is the cooking show loud?
faq.answer: The hibachi grill makes some sizzling sounds and there may be occasional flames for effect. It's part of the fun! Not suitable for very noise-sensitive environments.

faq.question: Do you offer kids' meals?
faq.answer: Children under 12 receive the same delicious food at 50% of the adult price. Portions are slightly smaller. Kids under 3 eat free.
